imdb.plot outline: This series of documentaries shows what is rarely seen in northern hemisphere television: the lives of African people, without stereotypes or preconceived notions. We take ten ordinary lives of exceptional individuals: their story represents Africa at its best, mired in a crossroad of modernity and tradition.
imdb.title: Eu Sou África
plot: This series of documentaries shows what is rarely seen in northern hemisphere television: the lives of African people, without stereotypes or preconceived notions.
